oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clingman's Dome from skyway
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This postcard shows a view of Clingman's Dome and other scenery in the Great Smoky Mountains National Park.

The Great Smokies are part of a larger mountain chain known as the Appalachian mountains. In Tennessee these mountains have different levels of elevation. Clingman's Dome is the highest point in the state of Tennessee and measures 6,642 feet in height.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Great Smoky Mountains National Park (N.C. and Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Great Smoky Mountains National Park (N.C. and Tenn.)
